Package javelin.model.item

Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.model.item.Item
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Artifact, Eidolon, Key, LearningStone.InertLearningStone, McGuffin, Potion, PreciousObject, Relic, ResourceSite.ResourceLink, Ruby, Scroll, TempleKey, Wand
    public abstract class Item
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Represents an item carried by a Combatant. Most often items are consumable. Currently only human players use items. When crafting new items, it takes a day per $1000 for the process to complete. Exceptions are Potions, which always take 1 day.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • provokesaoo

        public boolean provokesaoo
        Usually only Scrolls and Potions provoke attacks of opportunity.

      • targeted

        public boolean targeted
        Whether to select a Combatant to use this on.

      • sellvalue

        public double sellvalue
        A value between 0 and 1 signifying how much this item should be (re)sold for. A value of zero means the item can't be sold. Default is 50% original price.

      • failure

        protected volatile java.lang.String failure
        If not null will be used for describefailure().

    • Method Detail

      • randomize

        public Item randomize()
        Returns:
        A clone of this item (base implementation), with randomized parameters, meant for generating a new item to be found in a Chest, for example. Examples being: a used Wand with a certain amount of charges or a Gem with a random sell value.

      • waste

        public java.lang.String waste​(float resourcesused,
                              Combatant c,
                              java.util.ArrayList<Item> bag)
        Used as strategic resource damage.
        Parameters:
        c -
        Returns:
        Lowercase description of used resources or null if wasn't wasted.
        See Also:
        StartBattle

      • setup

        public static void setup()
        Creates Items from Spells.

      • getplayeritems

        public static java.util.List<Item> getplayeritems()
        Returns:
        A list of all Items in any Squad, Town trainees and Academy trainees (including subclasses).

      • randomize

        public static java.util.List<Item> randomize​(java.util.Collection<Item> from)
        Parameters:
        from - A sample of items (like ITEMS or from BYTIER).
        Returns:
        The same items but with randomized parameters, from cheapest to most expensive (previously shuffled to introduce order randomness for items with exact same price).
        See Also:
        randomize()

      • sell

        public boolean sell()
        Returns:
        true if this item can be currently sold.

      • describe

        public java.lang.String describe​(Combatant c)
        Returns:
        A human-readable description of this item.

      • canuse

        public boolean canuse​(java.util.List<Combatant> members)
        Returns:
        true if any of the Combatants can use this.
        See Also:
        canuse(Combatant)
